clinical_study.brief_title: An Observational Pre-post Study Evaluating the Safety of Tabernanthe Iboga Exposure
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational Pre-post Study Evaluating the Safety of Tabernanthe Iboga Exposure

brief_summary.textblock: This is an observational study aiming to investigate the risks and consequences of naturalistic tabernanthe iboga exposure in a population with a history of head trauma, combat or blast exposure. We will assess the safety profile of the compound through psychological and cognitive testing. Participants will also have an MRI before and after their exposure to the compound, to examine if there are any brain changes associated with its use. Participants must independently schedule to receive this compound in other countries.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in WAIS Block Design Subtest scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change will be assessed between baseline and immediate post visits
primary_outcome.description: A measure of visual-spatial and organizational processing abilities, as well as nonverbal problem-solving skills

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in WAIS Coding Subtest scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change will be assessed between baseline and immediate post visits
primary_outcome.description: A measure of visual-motor coordination, motor and mental speed

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in WAIS Digit Span Subtest scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change will be assessed between baseline and immediate post visits
primary_outcome.description: A measure of spatial perception, visual abstract processing & problem solving

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in Trail Making Task A & B scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change will be assessed between baseline and immediate post visits
primary_outcome.description: A 2 part test in which the subject is instructed to connect a set of 25 dots as quickly as possible while still maintaining accuracy to measure visual search speed, scanning, speed of processing, mental flexibility, as well as executive functioning.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in Hopkins Verbal Learning Test-Revised scores
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change will be assessed between baseline and immediate post visits
primary_outcome.description: A test of verbal learning and memory.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change in the Hamilton Depression Rating Scale (HAMD-21)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post time points.
secondary_outcome.description: A provider administered questionnaire used to assess remission and recovery from depression

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in the Montgomery-Asberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post time points.
secondary_outcome.description: A ten item diagnostic questionnaire used to measure the severity of depressive episodes in patients with mood disorders.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in the PTSD Symptom Scale Interview-5 scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between the baseline and one month time points.
secondary_outcome.description: A clinically administered questionnaire to assess the presence of PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) according to DSM-V criteria and assess the severity of PTSD symptoms in individuals with a known trauma history.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in responses to the Quality of Life Enjoyment and Satisfaction Questionnaire.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between the baseline, immediate post and one month time points.
secondary_outcome.description: A self-report measure designed to enable investigators to measure the degree of enjoyment and satisfaction experienced by subjects in various areas of daily functioning.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in Cognitive Failures Questionnaire scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline and one month post visits
secondary_outcome.description: A 25 item self-report questionnaire to assess the frequency with which people experienced cognitive failures, such as absent-mindedness, in everyday life

secondary_outcome.measure: Structural changes measured by an MRI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline and immediate post time points
secondary_outcome.description: Using a MRI scan of the brain to measure total gray matter and structural changes in the Ventral diencephalon, frontal lobes, and hippocampus.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in functional connectivity measured by an fMRI
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline and immediate post time points
secondary_outcome.description: Using a fMRI to examine irregularity in the default mode network

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in substance use measured by the Addiction Severity Index-Lite
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between the baseline and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A semi-structured interview to assess substance use change over the past 30 days.

other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between the baseline and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A clinically administered instrument to assess PTSD symptoms and severity.

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in disability functioning measured by the WHODAS
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A 36 item self-report questionnaire to assess disability levels relating to a health condition overall and in 6 different domains: cognition, mobility, self-care, getting along with others, participation in society, and life activities

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in the Scale of Suicidal Ideation
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A clinician-rating scale presented in a semi-structured interview format designed to assess the intensity, pervasiveness, and characteristics of suicidal ideation in adults.

other_outcome.measure: Change in symptoms measured by the Symptom Checklist 90 Revised (SCL-90-R)
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A 90 item self-report questionnaire to evaluate a broad range of psychological problems and symptoms of psychopathology that is also useful in measuring patient progress or treatment outcomes.

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in the Five Facets Mindfulness Questionnaire (FFMQ)
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A 39 item self-report questionnaire to assess the 5 facets of mindfulness.

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in the Forms of Self-Criticising/Attacking & Self-Reassuring Scale (FSCRS)
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A 22 item self-report instrument that measures self-criticism and self-reassurance

other_outcome.measure: Percentage change in the Becks Depression Inventory II (BDI-II)
other_outcome.time_frame: Changes will be measured between baseline, immediate post, and one month post visits
other_outcome.description: A 21 item self-report criteria-referenced assessment for measuring depression severity

arm_group.description: All study participants will be observed before and after they receive exposure to tabernanthe iboga in other countries.

intervention.intervention_name: tabernanthe iboga exposure in other countries
intervention.description: Participants will be subject to MRI and mood/cognitive testing before and after exposure to tabernanthe iboga in other countries.

study_pop.textblock: People with a history of head trauma, combat or blast exposure that have arranged for tabernanthe iboga exposure in other countries.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. History of head trauma, combat or blast exposure
2. Arranged for tabernanthe iboga exposure in other countries
3. Willing and able to travel to Stanford University before and after treatment.
4. Willing to be video recorded during the consenting process.
5. Capable of getting an MRI scan.
6. Male or female, 18-70 years of age, inclusive, at time of screening visit.
7. Body mass index between 17-35kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
1. History of a neurological disorder (i.e. Parkinson's, epilepsy, dementia, etc.)
2. History of schizophrenia, schizoaffective disorders, or any history of psychotic symptoms
3. Abnormal ECG assessed at baseline by a Stanford University medical doctor.
4. History of cardiovascular problems
5. History of liver or kidney problems
6. Has previously been exposed to tabernanthe iboga
7. Any participation in a clinical trial with an investigational device or drug during study or within 1 month prior to enrollment.
8. Claustrophobic
9. Female that is pregnant, breastfeeding, or trying to become pregnant.
